channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [MASTEK] Mastek Ltd Declares Interim Dividend of Rs. 8 per Share for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Mastek Ltd, at their board meeting held in Phoenix, Arizona, United States of America, approved and took on record the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company also declared an interim dividend of Rs. 8 (i.e. 160%) per Equity Share of the face value of Rs. 5 each, for the Financial Year 2025-26.

  • Approval of Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025
  • Interim Dividend of Rs. 8 per Equity Share for the Financial Year 2025-26

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: MASTEK LTD. | Category: Dividend

item.title: [MASTEK] Mastek Ltd Declares Interim Dividend of Rs. 8 per Share for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Mastek Ltd, a leading technology and digital transformation solutions provider, announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The company's Board of Directors approved the unaudited consolidated and standalone financial results, which will be made available on the company's website and published in newspapers as per SEBI regulations. The Board also declared an interim dividend of Rs. 8 (160%) per equity share of the face value of Rs. 5 each for the Financial Year 2025-26, which will be paid to the eligible shareholders on or before February 17, 2026.

  • Unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025 approved
  • Interim dividend of Rs. 8 (160%) per equity share declared for FY 2025-26
  • Dividend to be paid on or before February 17, 2026
  • Financial results to be made available on the company's website and published in newspapers

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: MASTEK LTD. | Category: Dividend

item.title: [MASTEK] Mastek Ltd Declares Interim Dividend of Rs.8/- per Equity Share for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Mastek Ltd has declared an interim dividend of Rs.8/- (i.e. 160%) per Equity Share of the face value of Rs. 5 each, for the Financial Year 2025-26. The record date for the dividend is January 30, 2026. The Board also approved and took on record the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025.

  • Mastek Ltd declares an interim dividend of Rs.8/- per Equity Share for FY 2025-26
  • The record date for the dividend is January 30, 2026
  • The Board approved and took on record the Unaudited Consolidated and Standalone Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025

Company: MASTEK LTD. | Category: Dividend

item.title: [MASTEK] Mastek Ltd Declares Interim Dividend of Rs. 8 per Share for FY 2025-26
item.description:
Mastek Ltd, a leading technology company, has declared an interim dividend of Rs. 8 (i.e. 160%) per Equity Share of the face value of Rs. 5 each, for the Financial Year 2025-26. The dividend will be paid to the equity shareholders whose names appear on the Register of Members of the Company / in the records of the Depositories as beneficial owners of the shares as on the Record Date, which is Friday, January 30, 2026. The decision was made at the Board Meeting held in Phoenix, Arizona, United States of America, on January 20, 2026 to January 21, 2026.

  • Mastek Ltd declares an interim dividend of Rs. 8 per share for FY 2025-26.
  • The Record Date for dividend eligibility is Friday, January 30, 2026.
  • The decision was made at the Board Meeting held in Phoenix, Arizona, United States of America.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: MASTEK LTD. | Category: Dividend

item.title: [RCCEMEN] RCC Cements Ltd Reports Zero Investor Complaints for Q4 2025
item.description:
RCC Cements Ltd has released its Statement of Investor Complaints for the quarter ended 31st December, 2025. According to the report, there were no pending complaints at the beginning of the quarter, no new complaints received during the quarter, and no complaints left unresolved at the end of the quarter. This indicates a positive relationship with investors and a commitment to addressing any issues promptly.

  • RCC Cements Ltd reported zero pending complaints at the beginning of Q4 2025
  • No new complaints were received during Q4 2025
  • All complaints received during the quarter were resolved
  • No complaints were left unresolved at the end of Q4 2025
  • This report indicates a positive relationship with investors and a commitment to addressing issues promptly

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: RCC CEMENTS LTD. | Category: Monthly Update

item.title: [GBLOGISTIC] GB Logistics Commerce Ltd. to Invest X7,21,00,000 in Plot and Warehouse
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

GB Logistics Commerce Ltd. has announced its intention to invest in a plot of land along with a warehouse situated at Garamsur, Mouza No. 85, Tah. Katol, Dist. Nagpur. The total proposed investment amount is X7,21,00,000/- (Rupees Seven Crore Twenty-One Lakh Only). The transaction involves a related party and is subject to compliance with applicable provisions of the Companies Act, 2013, SEBI (LODR) Regulations, and other applicable laws. A valuation report from a registered valuer will be obtained and all necessary approvals will be sought.

  • GB Logistics Commerce Ltd. to invest X7,21,00,000 in a plot and warehouse
  • The transaction involves a related party
  • The investment is subject to compliance with applicable laws
  • A valuation report from a registered valuer will be obtained
  • All necessary approvals will be sought

Company: GB Logistics Commerce Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [STYLEBAAZA] Baazar Style Retail Ltd. to Raise Funds Through Issuance of Equity Warrants to Cupid Limited
item.description:
Baazar Style Retail Ltd. has approved the issuance of 1,01,00,000 (One Crore One Lakh Only) Equity warrants at an issue price of X 328.25/- per equity warrant to Cupid Limited. This is a preferential issue, convertible into equivalent number of fully paid equity shares of the Company having face value of X5/- (Rupee five only) each, in one or more tranches within a period of 18 months from the date of allotment. The total amount for this issuance is 33,31,53,25,000/- (Rupees Three Hundred and Thirty-one Crores Fifty-Three Lakhs and Twenty-Five Thousand only). Monarch Networth Capital Limited is acting as a sole advisor to this transaction.

  • Baazar Style Retail Ltd. to raise funds through issuance of equity warrants
  • 1,01,00,000 Equity warrants to be issued at an issue price of X 328.25/- per warrant
  • Convertible into equivalent number of fully paid equity shares of the Company
  • Issue price of X 328.25/- per equity warrant
  • Monarch Networth Capital Limited acting as a sole advisor

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Baazar Style Retail Ltd | Category: Investment

item.title: [INDUSTOWER] Indus Towers Ltd Incorporates Step-Down Subsidiary in Uganda
item.description:
Indus Towers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the incorporation of a step-down subsidiary in Uganda, Indus Infra Uganda Limited. The new subsidiary, established for telecommunication towers, masts, poles, antennas, and other related infrastructure, will have a share capital of UGX 2,000,000,000. Indus Towers Limited will contribute to the initial share capital in cash at face value, acquiring 100% shareholding and control. The subsidiary was incorporated on January 20, 2026, in Uganda and is yet to commence its business operations.

  • Indus Towers Limited incorporates a step-down subsidiary in Uganda.
  • Subsidiary named Indus Infra Uganda Limited with a share capital of UGX 2,000,000,000.
  • Indus Towers Limited to contribute to the initial share capital in cash.
  • 100% shareholding and control acquired by Indus Towers Limited.
  • Subsidiary incorporated on January 20, 2026, in Uganda and yet to start operations.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Indus Towers Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [SERIND] SER Industries Ltd: Appointment of New Directors, Changes in Designation, and Proposed Acquisitions
item.description:
SER Industries Ltd has announced several significant changes and proposals in its recent board meeting. The board approved the appointment of Mr. Ayush Munnalal Sharma as an Additional Director (Non-Executive and Independent) for a term of 5 years. Mr. Sunil Kumar Shahi's designation was changed from Executive Director to Managing Director and Chairman of the Company for a term of 5 years. The board also approved the appointment of Mr. Shrenik Rajiv Karnawat as the Chief Financial Officer (CFO). Furthermore, the board considered increasing the authorized capital from Rs. 6,00,00,000 to Rs. 46,00,00,000 and approved the proposal to be placed before the shareholders. The board also approved the limits of INR 200 Crores for proposals requiring authorisation under Section 180(1)(a) and Section 180(1)(c) of the Companies Act, 2013. The board also approved granting of loans, guarantees, providing securities, or making investments exceeding the prescribed limits under Section 186 up to INR 800 Crores, subject to shareholder approval. The board also approved the proposed acquisition of upto 100% of SNA Milk and Milk Products Limited and DFSU Farmer Connect Private Limited against share swap by way issuance of securities of the Company on a preferential basis.

  • Appointment of Mr. Ayush Munnalal Sharma as Additional Director
  • Change in designation of Mr. Sunil Kumar Shahi to Managing Director and Chairman
  • Appointment of Mr. Shrenik Rajiv Karnawat as CFO
  • Proposal to increase authorized capital
  • Approval of limits for proposals under Section 180(1)(a) and Section 180(1)(c)

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SER Industries Ltd | Category: Acquisitions
